recipe.headline: Grilled Cabbage "Steaks"
recipe.overline: Course: Side Dish Cuisine: Vegetarian Servings: 8 servings Calories: 110 kcal
ingredients: 1 large head of cabbage, cut into ½"-thick rounds

steps.description: Heat grill over medium-high heat. Brush cabbage steaks on both sides with oil and season with salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes. Place on grill and cook until tender, about 5 minutes per side.
Top with bacon, blue cheese, and scallions and drizzle with ranch dressing before serving.
